descript.abstract: A spatial representation of road centerlines. This linear feature class was captured through stereo compilation using Oakland County's 1997 orthophotography as reference. Key attributes include left and right address ranges and street name.

citeinfo.origin: REQUIRED: The name of an organization or individual that developed the data set.
citeinfo.pubdate: REQUIRED: The date when the data set is published or otherwise made available for release.
citeinfo.title: RoadCenterline

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 2; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.3000

timeperd.current: REQUIRED: The basis on which the time period of content information is determined.

sngdate.caldate: REQUIRED: The year (and optionally month, or month and day) for which the data set corresponds to the ground.

attr.attrdef: Feature geometry.
Internal feature number.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Cartographic Representation of complete road name for cartographic output
CENTERLINE
CONV_SOURC
Municipal code on left side of the road.
Municipal code on right side of the road.
The direction of travel as defined by the from-to nodes.
Lowest address range on left side of the road.
Lowest address range on right side of the road.
Map page number on left side of feature
The road name.
Flag used to identify those roads that contain multiple road names that are stored in the ALIAS_NAME relate table.
The post direction of the road.
The road name prefix.
Map page number on right side of feature
Functional classification of roads based on type of service. A modified version of DOT's Federal Highway Administration (FHWA) classification scheme.
State or Federal route number
The road type.
The lowest TLID (TIGER Line Identification Number) as derived from the 1995 TIGER Census coverage.
Flag used to identify those segments that contain multiple TLID's that are stored in the DUP_TLID relate table.
Highest address range on left side of the road.
Highest address range on right side of the road.
4 digit version indicator - see TLID
Zip code on left side of the road.
Zip code on right side of the road.

dataIdInfo.envirDesc: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 2; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.3000

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata

cntorgp.cntper: REQUIRED: The person responsible for the metadata information.
cntorgp.cntorg: REQUIRED: The organization responsible for the metadata information.

cntaddr.addrtype: REQUIRED: The mailing and/or physical address for the organization or individual.
cntaddr.city: REQUIRED: The city of the address.
cntaddr.state: REQUIRED: The state or province of the address.
cntaddr.postal: REQUIRED: The ZIP or other postal code of the address.

cntinfo.cntvoice: REQUIRED: The telephone number by which individuals can speak to the organization or individual.
